ETYMOLOGY: From Latin sufficiens, present participle of sufficere ('to be enough, supply'), from sub- ('under, close up') + facere ('to make, do').

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Enough to meet a specified requirement or purpose; adequate.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 足够的；充足的；达到要求的。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: We have sufficient evidence to proceed with the case.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我们有足够的证据来继续审理此案。
